title: "Inside my shoes: Artificial intelligence lacks sense of humor"
excerpt: "I want to believe the comment was picked up via artificial intelligence (which obviously isn’t very intelligent given the context) and that a real human didn’t read the post and take it seriously. The original post discussed respecting people’s right of choice in regards to getting a COVID-19 vaccine."
